objects.text:
• BOLD NACHO CHEESE FLAVOR
• CRUNCHY TRIANGULAR SHAPE
• PERFECT FOR SHARING
• PACK OF 64 BAGS

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This square promotional banner features a bold and vibrant design, divided into four equally sized color quadrants utilizing a diagonal layout. A high-contrast product image is centrally placed, slightly leaning to the right, drawing immediate attention. The heading (id: "heading") is prominently displayed in a thick white font at the upper left, capturing attention, while the subheading (id: "subheading") below it adds flavor context in a bright yellow-orange hue. On the bottom left, a list (id: "description") highlights product features using concise bullet points. The price (id: "price") appears in large white typeface for impact, just above a call-to-action button (id: "cta_button_background" and "cta"). The background incorporates subtle geometric overlays and triangle motifs to enhance visual appeal. 

**Color Palette:**
- Primary Red: `#D50000`
- Deep Maroon: `#B71C1C`
- Bright Orange: `#FFA000`
- Dark Red: `#C62828`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Black: `#000000`
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image uses a bold and vibrant color palette dominated by fiery red (#C9221F) as the background, creating an intense, energetic visual impact. The chips themselves are a golden yellow-orange (#FCA82F), which pops vividly against the red, highlighting the product. Rich black (#000000) is used in the Doritos logo triangle, adding depth and anchoring the design, while white (#FFFFFF) provides contrast in the brand text. Bright orange highlights (#FF6B00) blend smoothly around the logo edges, creating a dynamic glow effect. These colors are effectively blended to emphasize excitement, bold flavor, and visual attraction for advertising.
